full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR GTOR MA DANG 'BREL BA MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RIN 'BYUNG NAS BSKUL BA'I 'DOD MOS LTAR, MKHAN MING 'DZIN PA WAG'INDRA SU MA TI PA tU SIDDHIS 'PHAGS MA 'DI'I GTOR MA'I LAS RIM GYI MAN NGAG DANG MI 'GAL ZHING BSKUL BA PO'I 'DOD DANG YANG MTHUN PAR KHU RE CHEN MOR BSDEBS PA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA SHRA MA nA BADZNY'AS GA RA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: WAG'INDRA SU MA TI PA tU SIDDHI,
